archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.6a: a) secure by design (e.g. considering the security requirements of a business application or system as part of its overall requirements, to protect itself and the information it processes, and to resist attacks)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
